repos_data.description: A self-contained, lightweight workflow engine with a built-in Web UI. Define workflows in a simple, declarative YAML format. Execute them anywhere, compose complex pipelines, and distribute tasks. Zero dependencies: runs entirely on the file system and OS without an external database.

A self-contained, lightweight workflow engine with a built-in Web UI. Define workflows in a simple, declarative YAML format. Execute them anywhere, compose complex pipelines, and distribute tasks. Zero dependencies: runs entirely on the file system and OS without an external database.
